DOC.detailed_description: This study aim determine Glycaemic Index Insulinaemic Index Values Five Cereal Products two different ethnic group . It laboratory-based research study , conduct two different ethnic group , open cross-over design , include 24 healthy non-smoking voluntary subject , age 18 45 year . 12 subject Caucasian 12 subject Asian . 8 test session per subject include study . Foods consume random order accord randomisation list . The impact ethnic group product determine .

People 's Republic Korea , Hong Kong SAR ( China ) , Indonesia , Japan , Lao People 's Democratic Republic , Macao SAR ( China ) , Malaysia , Mongolia , Myanmar , Philippines , Republic Korea , Singapore , Taiwan , Thailand , Viet Nam . Sex ratio : Around half subject male half subject female within study group . A plus minus 1 subject tolerance accept . Healthy subject : Normal glucose tolerance Normal laboratory value various measure metabolic health ( full blood count , gammaGT , AST , ALT , glucose , TAGs , total cholesterol , HDLcholesterol , LDLcholesterol ) ; Normal systolic blood pressure ( 100150 mmHg ) ; Normal diastolic blood pressure ( 6090 mmHg ) ; Normal rest heart rate ( 5090 beat per minute 3 minute rest ) . Stable dietary habit ; normal eating pattern ; history eat disorder strict dieting . Moderate level physical activity ( basic daily activity high level physical activity ( regular physical activity least 3 time per week ) ) Able fast least 10 hour night test session . Able refrain eat legume drink alcohol day test session .
